label: Science Equipment
description: Tools and supplies for scientific research and experimentation.

subcategories.label: Microscopes
subcategories.description: Optical instruments used for magnifying and observing small objects or organisms.

subcategories.label: Lab Supplies
subcategories.description: Equipment and materials used in scientific research and experimentation.

subcategories.label: Science Kits
subcategories.description: Educational kits designed to teach scientific concepts and principles.

subcategories.label: Measuring Equipment
subcategories.description: Tools used to measure physical properties of materials and substances.

subcategories.label: Safety Equipment
subcategories.description: Protective gear and equipment used to ensure safety in scientific research and experimentation.
